**Example 1: 通用查询 OpenTelemetry 调用链列表**

通用查询 OpenTelemetry 调用链列表

Input: 

```
tccli apm DescribeGeneralOTSpanList --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --InstanceId apm-CVfliqa8U \
    --StartTime 1739864668 \
    --EndTime 1739865268 \
    --Limit 10
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "51e8f6fe-f343-45f1-899a-08547ab7b10d",
        "Spans": "",
        "TotalCount": 26674
    }
}
```
